speakersYaml.name: Shawna Bankovich
speakersYaml.biography: Shawna is a Senior Data Science consultant at CGI with a passion for helping clients operationalize their data driven applications and realize their true value. She has a variety of consulting experience spanning data science, data engineering, full stack development, and project management. Shawna has BS degrees in Mechanical Engineering and Mathematics from Penn State and received her MS in Computer Science specialized in Machine Learning from Georgia Tech. Prior to her career in consulting, Shawna worked in manufacturing technology on the F-35 program. Shawna is originally from Scranton, PA, but now she enjoys the sunny Dallas, TX weather.
